Package Main

Class Ghost

java.lang.Object
Main.Entity
Main.MovingEntity
Main.Ghost
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Ghost extends MovingEntity implements Runnable
class implementing ghosts that chase pacman

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    Ghost.MovementMode
    enum of movment modes of ghosts:
    CHASE -> chase pacman
    SCATTER -> move to corner
    static enum 
    Ghost.Personality
    enum of ghost personality BLINKY - always chase pacman
    PINKY - tries to ambush pacman
    INKY - whimsical strategy of chase
    CLYDE - randomly mimics other ghosts
